Description:
Position Title:             Application AdministrationEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 12K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:One of the leading telecommunications and security companies, based in Abu Dhabi with global presence in the industry Job Description:Install, configure, and maintain software applications, ensuring proper integration with other systems; troubleshoot issues, and optimize performance parameters to monitor application performance
Implement security measures and access controls to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with security policies
Manage application data, including backups, restores, and data migrations
Conduct testing, including regression testing, after application updates and changes ensuring full functionality of updated or new features
Maintain accurate documentation of application configurations, procedures, user guide, training materials and troubleshooting stepsSkills
Skills:
Open to Arabic and Indian nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
At least 3 years of experience as an Application Administrator or in a similar role leading application deployment, configuration, and management
Hands on experience with database management systems and SQL queries
Ability to work independently and manage tasks with minimal supervision
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
